Documentation

Learn how to build a website with boba, today!

Code Presenter

Make code snippets presentable
console.log("Boba is great!");
<div class="code-block">
    <pre class="code">
        <code data-lang="javascript">
            console.log("Boba is great!");
        </code>
    </pre>
</div>

Inline Code

Draw attention to code fragments using the .inline class
This is an .example-class 
This is an <code class="inline">.example-class</code>
